scripts.build-css: sass src/styles/index.scss styles/index.css && sass src/styles/themes/dark.scss styles/dark.css && sass src/styles/themes/light.scss styles/light.css
scripts.start: nodemon -e scss -x "npm run build-css && npm run build-js"
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js && mkdir -p pack && npm pack --pack-destination='./pack'
